notes: "Percentage of patients attending accident and emergency that are admitted to hospital"

variable description: The number of attendances that resulted in an admission to the hospital.
notes: "Number of patients admitted to hospital following attendance at accident and emergency"

variable description: The number of attendances for this department type at this organisation for this month.
notes: "Number of patients that attended accident and emergency in a month"
"How successful a department is at reaching 4 hour target"

variable description: The number of attendances that breached the four-hour target.
notes: "Number of missed 4 hour targets in a month"

variable description: The consent from the end-user to process and share the data collected with the data capture tool.
notes: "Has patient given consent to process data"

variable description: The index column that allows us to link the data collected to the original ae_attendances data in the 'RawData' folder.

The Organisation data service (ODS) code for the organisation. If you want to know the organisation associated with a particular ODS code, you can look it up from the following address: https://odsportal.digital.nhs.uk/Organisation/Search.
notes: "SANDWELL AND WEST BIRMINGHAM HOSPITALS NHS TRUST"

variable description: The month that this activity relates to, stored as a date (1st of each month).
